endpoints.description: Retrieve the current state of inventory including stock levels and product details.
Create a new order request specifying product quantities, customer details, and delivery preferences.
Retrieve details of the specified order including its status, items, and expected delivery date.
Update details of an existing order, including modifying quantities or updating shipping details.
Add a new product to the inventory specifying attributes such as name, category, price, and stock quantity.
Fetch a list of available suppliers including their contact details and provided products.
Define a new distribution route including its stops, transit times, and associated regions.
Retrieve analytical insights and trends on inventory levels and turnover rates.
Modify operation settings of a specific warehouse, such as hours of operation or storage capacities.
Cancel the specified order and update the inventory accordingly.
